name: RIZZ
description: $RIZZ is a utility token on Solana that powers the RizzClub AI platform ecosystem. The token's primary utility is enabling access to RizzLab, a no-code platform for deploying AI chatbots across Telegram, WhatsApp, and SMS for use cases including lifestyle assistance, DeFi, booking services, and customer support. Token holders stake $RIZZ to unlock bot deployment features, participate in governance voting on platform development, and access the creator marketplace where users can sell and purchase specialized AI content and templates. The ecosystem includes flagship products like RizzClub (dating/social AI), ShelfControl (meal planning AI), FitCheck.Baby (fashion AI), and Rizz.vip (creator monetization).
